mapper.select: SELECT v.ACTIVE_POWER, v.FACTOR, v.voltage, v.FTU_CURRENT, v.SEND_MODE, d.INS_LINE_NAME FROM FTU_ELECTL_VOLUME v LEFT JOIN FTU_DEVICE d on v.FTU_ID = d.ID order by V.CREATE_TIME desc limit 20
SELECT D.INS_LINE_NAME, D.STATUS, D.LNG, D.LAT, D.DEVICE_NAME, F.COMMUNICATION_MODE, D.ID, D.IP, D.STATION, F.ONLINE_STATUS FROM FTU_DEVICE D LEFT JOIN FTU_F411_DEVICE F ON D.ID = F.FTU_ID
